### YouTube provides RSS service officially ðŸŽ‰

### First, open the YouTube channel page you want to subscribe to and copy the channel URL
![](images/youtube1.png)


### You can use online tools like <mark>[TubePilot](https://tubepilot.ai/tools/youtube-rss-feed-generator/)</mark>, enter the channel URL, and click the Generate button
![](images/youtube2.png)


### The website will generate an RSS feed
![](images/youtube3.png)

### Paste the generated feed URL into the RSS URL input box at the top of the page, click the Add button to subscribe
![](images/RSS_URL.png)
